description: This file is the entry point for a React application, responsible for rendering the main App component into the DOM element with id 'root'. It initializes the React rendering process and wraps the App component in React.StrictMode for highlighting potential issues.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering the React application into a specified DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the created React root.
